$aTactical retreat can be ordered only
$a0 more time(s). If you reset your
chain, however, your tactical retreats
will once again be available for use.

You have used the last of your tactical
retreats. If you reset your chain, they
will once again be available for use.

Tactical Retreat, as of May 10:
Twice per chain of wins, you can
return to the Arena screen without
losing your score or your chain.
If you reset your chain, however,
your tactical retreat will become
available for use again.
